en.answer: In both situations, since they are not cases in which a Winged Beast-Type monster on the field is destroyed by battle, as well as sent to the Graveyard, Black Wing Revenge cannot be activated.
en.question: If DNA Surgery was activated by declaring Winged Beast-Type, and a monster that was originally Warrior-Type is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, can Black Wing Revenge be activated? Also, if DNA Surgery was activated by declaring Warrior-Type, and a monster that was originally Winged Beast-Type is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, can Black Wing Revenge be activated?
en.title: If DNA Surgery was activated by declaring Winged Beast-Type, and a monster that was originally Warrior-Type is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, can Black Wing Revenge be activated? Also, if DNA Surgery was activated by declaring Warrior-Type, and a monster that was originally Winged Beast-Type is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, can Black Wing Revenge be activated?

ja.answer: 質問のどちらの状況の場合も『自分フィールドの鳥獣族モンスターが戦闘で破壊され墓地へ送られた』扱いにはなりませんので、「<<11176>>」を発動する事はできません。
ja.question:
鳥獣族を宣言して発動している「<<4951>>」の効果が適用されている場合、元々の種族が戦士族のモンスターが戦闘で破壊され墓地へ送られた時に「<<11176>>」を発動する事はできますか？

また、戦士族を宣言して発動している「<<4951>>」の効果が適用されている場合、元々の種族が鳥獣族のモンスターが戦闘で破壊され墓地へ送られた時に、「<<11176>>」を発動する事はできますか？
ja.title: 「<<4951>>」の効果が適用されているモンスターが破壊された際に「<<11176>>」を発動できますか？
